title: A previous team member of mine from a now disbanded team is giving out my personal details pls help.
body:
Riot Please.

<removed>

In this match of mine, he was in this game and did these things please help.

this is actually a serious issue.

replies.body:
Hey there, 

I've gone ahead and removed the details from your post as the boards are not the place to report this, as serious of an issue as it may be.

For cases such as these, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will handle the issue from there.

Note: you will not receive any details of the outcome of your ticket, however rest assured that the issue will be handled appropriately.
